title: DDFP 596: Week 1 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Division Previews Wrap-up
itunes:title: DDFP 596: Week 1 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Division Previews Wrap-up
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank, Matt "Money" Smith and Cynthia Frelund to finish previewing the NFC North, AFC South and NFC South divisions ahead of kickoff. Also, Shek gives his highly anticipated prediction for the Steelers' record this season and asks the group for their 2017 NFL playoffs final four. Lastly, in the Week 1 edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks, EmmaVP premieres her new "NFL TV Guide" summaries for the biggest matchups of the week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
